name: Block World (itch) (zesty1002)
description:
Play as Zesty and traverse the unforgiving land of Block World. 

Instructions

Walk: WASD/Arrow Keys

Run: Hold Shift

Attack: F

Jump: Space

Double Jump: Space x2

Tips

Press the space bar fully and rapidly to gain height on your double jump. 

Pressing "Exit" on the browser version will freeze the game, Simply move your cursor upward and click the "X" to exit fullscreen.

Credits

Special thanks to GWRITERSTUDIO for the music and DUSTYROOM for the game sfx.
